interestingcomments.content:
About Film Development /!/ Hi fellow Leica shooters, I wonder how you guys go about shooting film these days. 

I’m trying to find the best way to archive my film photos digitally on my cloud drive where most of my pictures go. Currently I scan my negatives using a plustek scanner, save them in dng and use negative film pro in Lightroom to develop them. The result has been quite good but not sure if there are some other ways (convenience is one important aspect for me)
